Title: Provides for mandatory revocation of driver's license for certain convictions under the penal law
Summary: Provides for the mandatory revocation of a driver's license for certain convictions under the penal law, followed by a period of one year of operating with a post-revocation conditional license.
LawCode: Amd ยง1193, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to revocation of licenses in certain cases
